page.title: 10Greatworth and Marston clubs
page.content: Marston St Lawrence has a wide range of clubs and activities. We have listed some of them:Women's Institute, Men's club, Cricket club, Billard Club, Youth club and bellringers. Many of these activities take place in the village hall. Many Greatworth clubs are centred around the sports and social club building. The Good Companions club, Youth club and football club use the building. Other organisations are the Women's Institute, Mothers Union, Conservative Association, Voluntary Transport scheme,Help the Aged and Domino and Darts teams at the Inn. The Brownies meet on a weekly basis in the school hall.Children from Farthinghoe also attend these meetings which are organised by two ladies from Greatworth.Children can transfer to Guides at Middleton Cheney when of age
